title: Crew Show!
description:
This week on The Smokin Tire

  • Matt visits the DMV
  • An Aventador was procured and subsequently driven to Las Vegas
  • Taxis escort supercars
  • Nino brings us all delicious snacks
  • Matt's DeLorean is nearly finished
  • We discuss our time at SEMA
  • Zack is preparing for a cross country drive in an M3
  • What is the best rental car for a west coast vaction?
  • We prepare for a roadtrip to Reno.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
